text: Ataṟku iṟaivaṉ ‘‘umatu cakōtararaik koṇṭu umatu tōḷkaḷai nām valuppaṭuttuvōm. Nām uṅkaḷukku veṟṟiyaiyum taruvōm. Ākavē avarkaḷ uṅkaḷai neruṅkavum muṭiyātu. Nīṅkaḷ namatu (inta)attāṭcikaḷuṭaṉ (tayakkamiṉṟic celluṅkaḷ.) Nīṅkaḷum uṅkaḷ iruvaraip piṉpaṟṟiyavarkaḷumtāṉ veṟṟi peṟuvīrkaḷ'' eṉṟu kūṟiṉāṉ
